TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RIPEMD160Managed extends System.Security.Cryptography.RIPEMD160

summary.span: 使用托管库计算输入数据的 哈希值。

span.span: Computes the hash for the input data using the managed library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ripemd-160 是 160 位加密哈希函数。RIPEMD-160 is a 160-bit cryptographic hash function. 它旨在以用作 128 位哈希函数 MD4、 MD5 和 RIPEMD 安全的替代。It is intended for use as a secure replacement for the 128-bit hash functions MD4, MD5, and RIPEMD. RIPEMD 被开发欧洲项目 RIPE （争用完整性基元评估版，1988年 1992年） 的框架。RIPEMD was developed in the framework of the EU project RIPE (RACE Integrity Primitives Evaluation, 1988-1992). > [!NOTE] > 通过安全哈希算法 sha-256 和 SHA 512 和它们的派生的类，已被取代。 has been superseded by the Secure Hash Algorithms SHA-256 and SHA-512 and their derived classes. 和提供更好的安全和性能比。 and offer better security and performance than . 使用仅为与旧的应用程序和数据的兼容性。Use only for compatibility with legacy applications and data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何编码文件使用类以及如何对文件进行解码。The following code example shows how to encode a file using the class and then how to decode the file. [!code-cpp[RIPEMD160#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RIPEMD160/CPP/ripemd160.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RIPEMD160#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RIPEMD160/CS/ripemd160.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RIPEMD160#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/RIPEMD160/vb/ripemd160.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 哈希用作表示大量的数据的固定大小的唯一值。The hash is used as a unique value of fixed size representing a large amount of data. 当且仅当相应的数据还将匹配，则应与匹配的两个数据集的哈希值。Hashes of two sets of data should match if and only if the corresponding data also matches. 中大型不可预测的哈希变化的数据结果的小改动。Small changes to the data result in large unpredictable changes in the hash. 哈希大小算法为 160 位。The hash size for the algorithm is 160 bits. ## Examples 下面的代码示例计算类目录中的所有文件的哈希值。The following code example computes the class hash for all files in a directory. [!code-cpp[RIPEMD160#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RIPEMD160/CPP/ripemd160.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RIPEMD160#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RIPEMD160/CS/ripemd160.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RIPEMD160#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/RIPEMD160/vb/ripemd160.vb#1)]

exception.span: 此策略不符合 FIPS 算法。

span.span: The policy is not compliant with the FIPS algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void HashCore (byte[] rgb, int ibStart, int cbSize);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void HashCore(unsigned int8[] rgb, int32 ibStart, int32 cbSize) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub HashCore (rgb As Byte(), ibStart As Integer, cbSize As Integer)
protected: override void HashCore(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgb, int ibStart, int cbSize);

param.name: ibStart
param.span: 字节数组中的偏移量，从该位置开始使用数据。

span.span: The offset into the byte array from which to begin using data.

param.name: cbSize
param.span: 数组中用作数据的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes in the array to use as data.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，将写入对象的数据路由到 哈希算法以计算哈希值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, routes data written to the object into the hash algorithm for computing the hash.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由应用程序代码不调用此方法。This method is not called by application code. 此抽象方法执行哈希计算。This abstract method performs the hash computation. 每次写入到加密流对象传递数据，通过此方法。Every write to the cryptographic stream object passes the data through this method. 对于每个数据块，此方法更新哈希对象的状态，以便在数据流的末尾，则返回正确的哈希值。For each block of data, this method updates the state of the hash object so a correct hash value is returned at the end of the data stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance unsigned int8[] HashFinal() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function HashFinal () As Byte()

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，在加密流对象处理完最后的数据后完成哈希计算。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, finalizes the hash computation after the last data is processed by the cryptographic stream object.

returns.span: 字节数组中计算所得的哈希代码。

span.span: The computed hash code in a byte array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由应用程序代码不调用此方法。This method is not called by application code. 此方法完成任何部分计算并返回数据流的正确哈希值。This method finalizes any partial computation and returns the correct hash value of the data stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize() cil managed

summary.span: 使用托管库初始化 类的实例。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class using the managed library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ripemd-160 是 160 位加密哈希函数。RIPEMD-160 is a 160-bit cryptographic hash function. 它旨在以用作 128 位哈希函数 MD4、 MD5 和 RIPEMD 安全的替代。It is intended for use as a secure replacement for the 128-bit hash functions MD4, MD5, and RIPEMD. RIPEMD 被开发欧洲项目 RIPE （争用完整性基元评估版，1988年 1992年） 的框架。RIPEMD was developed in the framework of the EU project RIPE (RACE Integrity Primitives Evaluation, 1988-1992).
